data:
Facsimile Images

Δαμαίνε
τος Μνα
σία

Apparatus criticus

Text after Sudano 2015

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

This is a lamina bearing a name followed by a patronymic, both of which are well attested in Sicily (see Sudano 2015, 703) and both featuring doric traits. The document has been interpreted as a civic tessera (see Cordano 1992) or as a votive tessera (Orsi 1897, 262-263; Manganaro 2003, 152) applied over an anathema, although it does not have any application hole.

bibliography

    Sudano 2015 703, no. 5, fig. 11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002382 Manganaro 2003 150-152 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001843 Cordano 1992 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002376 Orsi 1897 262-263, fig. 45 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002375
    Camera 2020 155, fig. 7.5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002379
